reviewText: Welcome to the world of Tinto Brass, where all the women are naked and beautiful, all the men are eager, and all the bottoms are above average.  He has a very special vision, a unique way of looking at the world, and his films burst with life-affirmation, joy, pleasure, and...did I mention the beautiful naked women?Probably best known in the West for his notorious filmCaligula, a film which he disowned after Bob Guccione stuck a bunch of hard core scenes into it, Tinto Brass is an Italian filmmaker who specializes in light romantic sex comedies.  His films have a sense of brightness and ease that make sex seem like innocent fun instead of something dirty.For those unfamiliar with his work, this box set makes a good introduction.  Two of the films,Cheeky!AndFrivolous Lola, are fairly similar in that they have simple plots and stories to get the characters in motion, while Private is an anthology series of five shorts. The three DVDs are the uncut and uncensored versions of the films.Of the three, "Private" is the most hard core, and "Frivolous Lola" is the least.  None of the gals hold anything back in the three films however, and the only ones disappointed will be the people who don't like watching carefree, beautiful naked girls doing their thing.
Title: N/A
